title: WTB: T203 Comic BB, any info?
author: bh3443

posts.post_title: WTB: T203 Comic BB, any info?
posts.post_content:
Hi,
I was just wondering what a T203 in a PSA holder (any grade) will cost.
It's on the PSA T Sampler check list, so I will need one!
Any info would be great, and any info on one for sale is great, too!
Thanks,
Bill Hedin

Hi Bill
A T203 in average gd-vg condition will cost about $10-$25. They are fairly common on ebay. There are 2 different type backs and the Winner Cut Plug one will be about 3x-5x value. Good luck.
